sent.orig: How many letters are there in the word'struggle"?
sent.trans: struggle这个单词有多少个字母？

sent.orig: The struggle of a disabled man in Boston to survive, to live decently is our struggle.
sent.trans: 波士顿残疾人为生存、为过上体面生活的斗争就是我们的斗争。

sent.orig: This is a life-and-death class struggle. It is dangerous to lose vigilance in such a struggle.
sent.trans: 这是你死我活的阶级搏斗，在这样一场搏斗中，丧失警惕是危险的。

sent.orig: Struggle is mutual; now is the time that many people are waging struggle against us.
sent.trans: 斗争是互相斗争，现在是许多人向我们进行斗争的时候了。

sent.orig: The struggle for existence, in the case of the newspaper, has been a struggle for circulation.
sent.trans: 生存竞争就报纸来说，乃是为报纸的发行而斗争。
